"シャンプラン": "Hm? You a Meteorn?"
"What do you want?"
"Brrr... Freezing! They expect people to work like this?!"
"... Huh? What's your deal, pal? Got business with me?"
"Am I okay...? You seriously askin' me that right now?"
"What the hell kinda question is that? I'm out here bustin' my ass, and what does my boss say?"
"He just tells me to deal with it. Get these requested items here, take out the Formers there..."
"Listen, if you're really doin' this, make sure you got everything you need!"
"I ain't takin' the blame if you end up catching a cold or something."
"So yeah, I'm doin' just peachy. Just leave me alone, alright?"
"Hey, uh... thanks for takin' care of that mission for me."
"I mean, I coulda done it myself if I put my mind to it, it's just..."
"It's so damn cold I can barely move."
"I bet you're wondering why I joined this vanguard if I can't handle the cold, right?"
"Yeah well, I didn't think it'd be THIS freakin' cold! It's my first time here, how was I supposed to know?!"
"And... I figured there wouldn't be very many Meteorn up here."
"Anyways, enough about me. I gotta do some repairs on this tent."
"I've got my plate full as it is, I don't have time to sit around and chat."
"Later."
"What? You still need somethin'?"
"Come again? You want to take some stuff off my plate?"
"Pretty sure your plate's even fuller than mine..."
"Well, if you're offering... then, yeah, I'd appreciate it."
"Can you get me some Blizzardium?"
"It gets way colder out there when it's snowing, so be careful out there."
"...Yeah, I figured. Oh well, I'll figure something out."
"Thanks for the Blizzardium."
"Just lemme get these scanned real quick."
"...Say, why're you doin' all this? Takin' care of my missions for me and stuff?"
"You think I'm unreliable or something? You think I ain't up to the job?"
"Or maybe you just wanna show off your Meteorn strength?"
"...You know what, never mind."
"Oh, data scan's done. Here, you can have these back."
"Anyways, thanks again. You really helped me out."
"I, uh... just got a request to take out some enemies and to record the combat data."
"It's a lot of enemies, too. Pain in the ass, am I right?"
"What? I mean yeah, it'd be great if you could take care of it, but..."
"The targets are the night-time Alters."
"If it's too much to ask, just say so, alright?"
"...Yeah, oh well. I'll figure something out."
